entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes All these tweets this morning & not one single mention of the 42,518 #Americans who have lost their lives on his watch. No words of sympathy, no encouragement, no leadership. Just a whole bunch of personal attacks & gloating. 

#Trump #NarcissisticPersonalityDisorder #COVID19
